sn4.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn4.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava rattandhakaratimisayam abbhokase nisinno hoti, devo ca ekamekam phusayati.
sn4.6:2.1: Atha kho maro papima bhagavato bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo mahantam sapparajavannam abhinimminitva yena bhagava tenupasankami.
sn4.6:2.8: Seyyathapi nama deve galagalayante vijjullata niccharanti;
sn4.6:2.10: Seyyathapi nama kammaragaggariya dhamamanaya saddo hoti;
sn4.6:3.1: Atha kho bhagava “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn4.6:7.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
